title: Fail to create the external process in make_example step
body:
In the step of make_example, Bam2VcfPiperDeepVariantME.py does not create the external process of /usr/local/seqslab/deepvariant/bazel-bin/deepvariant/make_examples.
 
Per seqpiper.log, the log file shows that the input data of Bam2VcfPiperDeepVariantME.py, generated by PiedPiper.jar, could be invalid.
Because PiedPiper.jar is released in binary format, it's supposed that the others have no way to identify and fix this issue.

My system is based on hadoop-2.8.5 and spark-2.2.3.
There are 8 vcore and 100GB memory in one node.

Thanks.

```
stat("/usr/local/seqslab/SeqPiper/script/common/base.py", {st_mode=S_IFREG|0755, st_size=14491, ...}) = 0
2019-06-08 20:37:15,310 [ERROR] /usr/local/seqslab/SeqPiper/script/Bam2VcfPiperDeepVariantME.py:37      main    SeqPiper Error Report:
 Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/seqslab/SeqPiper/script/Bam2VcfPiperDeepVariantME.py", line 28, in main
    SeqPiperBase.pipe_stdin_bam(order)
  File "/usr/local/seqslab/SeqPiper/script/common/base.py", line 145, in pipe_stdin_bam
    order.part_id = items[-2]
IndexError: list index out of range
```

title: About deepvariant experiment environment
body:
Hi,

Very thanks your project.

Can this project run on local server ?

Thanks,
Jacky.

title: Sources for PiedPiper.jar
body:
Hi,

Is there any chance of making PiedPiper.jar sources public? Thanks.
